Loading an Odin Model

Source: R/model_simulation.R
load_model.Rd

Loading an Odin Model

Usage

load_model(name)

Arguments

name

name of the model written in Odin DSL to be loaded. This is a path to an R file,

Value

the loaded model to be used for simulation, inference, etc

Examples

load_model("model_new_R_with_FOI")
